Booby Trap.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Your Sensor Drones explode dealing 600 damage and knocking back when an enemy is within 20ft.

Contingency.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Increase Deflector Shield's Health by {scale=200|200}.

Controlling Nature.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Successful shots in Precision Sights reduce the Cooldown of Sensor Drone by {scale=0.06|0.06}s.

Crack the Whip.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Gain {scale=6|6}% Lifesteal against enemies revealed by Sensor Drone

Eyes on the Prize.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Reduce recoil by {scale=20|20}% while using Precision Sights.

Hidden Reserves.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Every shot made in Precision Sights has a {scale=8|8}% chance to not cost ammo.

Informants.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Heal for {scale=100|100} Health if you kill an enemy revealed by your Sensor Drone.

Joyless Eyes.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Increase the vision range of Sensor Drone by {scale=10|10}%

Lightweight Alloy.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Bring up Precision Sights {scale=15|15}% faster.

Nowhere to Hide.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Sensor Drone's reveal lasts an additional {scale=1|1}s after an enemy leaves its vision range.

Opportunity in Chaos.card_desc: [Weapon] After firing continuously for 2s, gain 20% increased damage.

Plans Within Plans.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Heal for {scale=20|20} Health per second while Deflector Shield is active.

Scapegoat.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] While Deflector Shield is active {scale=10|10}% of damage dealt to you is instead dealt to the Shield.

Suspect Everyone.card_desc: [Armor] You and your deployables take 20% less damage from enemies revealed by your Sensor Drone.

Unchecked Ambition.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting a shot has a {scale=12|12}% chance to not cost ammo.

Unfair Advantage.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Increase Deflector Shield's lifetime by {scale=1|1}s.
